title: Ep. 44 - Deck Picks
itunes:title: Ep. 44 - Deck Picks
itunes:subtitle: Henry, Ron, Glenn, and Mr. Moustache draw from The Deck of Many Things, and nothing will ever be the same...This episode contains graphic language, violence, sexual content, drug/alcohol use, and animal death.Support the show on Patreon!Get merc...
description:
Henry, Ron, Glenn, and Mr. Moustache draw from The Deck of Many Things, and nothing will ever be the same...


This episode contains graphic language, violence, sexual content, drug/alcohol use, and animal death.


Support the show on Patreon!

Get merch and more at our website!

Follow us on Twitter @dungeonsanddads!

Check out the subreddit!

Project DADGUT is the group transcription project


DM is Anthony Burch

Darryl Wilson is Matt Arnold (@mattlarnold)

Henry Oak is Will Campos (@willbcampos)

Ron Stampler is Beth May (@heybethmay)

Glenn Close is Freddie Wong (@fwong)


Theme song by Maxton Waller

Cover art by Alex Moore (@notanotheralex)


Send us stuff and get in contact: https://www.dungeonsanddaddies.com/contact


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
